attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Mr. Brown,
It is good that you were seen actually working with your Chinese counterpart in this severe wheather. But it will boost your government as people focused if you could declare as public holidays except for health workers starting today 2/2/09 for the period of the snow.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
